Tips for Reading English Stories

Read at Your Level

Choose stories that are slightly challenging but not overwhelming for best learning results.

Note New Words

Keep a vocabulary journal of new words and phrases you encounter while reading.

Read Multiple Times

Read each story more than once to improve comprehension and notice details you missed.

Take Your Time

Don't rush through stories. Understanding is more important than speed.
